about_the_game:
Indian Ocean Raid & Royal Navy




New scenario: Indian Ocean Raid, April 1942

The Imperial Japanese Navy makes a forray into the Indian Ocean in an attempt to deter or destroy the British Eastern Fleet.
Enjoy British units from the Royal Navy with their armored flight decks, CAP vectoring and night-strike capability.
detailed_description:
Indian Ocean Raid & Royal Navy




New scenario: Indian Ocean Raid, April 1942

The Imperial Japanese Navy makes a forray into the Indian Ocean in an attempt to deter or destroy the British Eastern Fleet.
Enjoy British units from the Royal Navy with their armored flight decks, CAP vectoring and night-strike capability.

fullgame.name: Carrier Battles 4 Guadalcanal - Pacific War Naval Warfare

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.13 or higher
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Intel Dual Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal supporting graphic card (2012 latest)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Sierra 10.13 or higher
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Intel Dual Core Or Apple Silicon ARM
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal supporting graphic card (2012 latest)
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10+
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Intel Dual Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB NVIDIA GeForce 9600 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+) or higher
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Intel Dual Core
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 MB DirectX 11 compatible
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11+ Compatible

short_description: The Imperial Japanese Navy makes a forray into the Indian Ocean in an attempt to deter or destroy the British Eastern Fleet. Enjoy British units which have armored flight decks, CAP vectoring and night-strike capability.
supported_languages: English, French, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Italian
